item.title: Ray Dalio says a risky AI market bubble is forming, but may not pop until the Fed tightens
item.description: Dalio talked with CNBC's Sara Eisen in an exclusive interview from the Future Investment Institute in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

item.title: AI, bitcoin and e-commerce trades lead Sohn conference's best ideas
item.description: Emerging hedge fund managers touted their best ideas at the Sohn San Francisco investment conference on Tuesday.

item.title: This San Francisco-based satellite company's stock has doubled in the past three months
item.description: The stock has soared more than 215% this year despite slides earlier this year.

item.title: Cytokinetics has been on a tear as the biotech pioneers more drugs to fight heart ailments
item.description: Shares of Cytokinetics, which targets medicines for specialty heart diseases, have jumped about 69% over the past three months and are up 31% year to ...

item.title: Top picks from the Sohn conference include digital mortgage and advertising stocks
item.description: Gaurav Gupta, founder and CIO of Floating Capital, has his eyes on Blend Labs, a digital mortgage software company.
